mapper.select: select sct.sctid, sct.sid, sct.grade, sct.term, sct.create_time, ts.student_name, tt.tid, tt.teacher_name, tc.cid, tc.course_name from t_score_course_teacher sct left join t_student ts on ts.sid = sct.sid left join t_teacher tt on tt.tid = sct.tid left join t_course tc on tc.cid = sct.cid where sct.term = #{term} and sct.delete_status = 1
